text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE REGIONAL DIRECTOR
Reg ion III
Radio Station WBAA
Lafayette, Indiana
February 2, 1960
Mr. William Harley
600 North Park
Madison, Wisconsin
Dear Bill:
I KNOW BY SOME COPIES OF CORRESPONDENCE THAT REGION VI
IS HOLDING A REGIONAL MEETING. I THOUGHT MAYBE WE WOULD
GET A CHANCE TO CHAT BRIEFLY REGARDING THE POSSIBILITIES OF
a Region III meeting during our Chicago get together this
Friday. Want to bring your thoughts on this matter with
you?
SincerelY
D i rector
WBAA Radio - TV Unit
JSM:vml
